job.title: Remote Senior Data Engineer/ Data Scientist
job.description: strongUnlimited PTO every other Fridays off consistently voted best places to workbrbrstrongThis Jobot Job is hosted by Amber HeigerickbrbrAre you a fit Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button and sending us your resumebrbrSalary 120000  160000 per yearbrbrstrongA Bit About UsbrbrstrongWe are a well established Technology company consistently voted best places to workbrbrstrongbrbrstrongWhy join usbrbrbrstrongstrongWe believe that everyone deserves to thrive at the company they are part of We treat our employees like our clients without you we wouldnt have a company We give our employees unlimited PTO flexible work hours and every other Fridays off These are just some of our perks We have very low turnover because we have happy employees We like to promote from with in whenever possible and 90 of the time are able to do that Come join a company that you can learn grow have fun and create memories and experiences that will last a lifetimebrbrstrongJob DetailsbrbrstrongAs a Senior Data Engineer  Data Scientist you will be collaborating with product engineers and software architects to help lead and grow our initiativesbrbrYou should know the followingbrbr5 years as a Data Engineer Data Scientist or Machine Learning EngineerbrbrProven experience in Machine Learning techniquesbrbr2 years deploying data science features in production and working with tools such as Python Spark and SQLbrbrExperience working with unlabled and unstructured databrbrInterested in hearing more Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply buttonbrbr
